name: Star Souled (Demo)
description:
StarSouled

In this world constellations are beings! Deities with extreme power they use to watch over the planet earth. Until one day the Dark Preon Appeared. This entity began corrupting and absorbing the powers of constellations, it started with the Zodiacs being the most powerful but also vein they easily fell. The dark preon then used the zodiacs to absorb or defeat the other constellations sending some of them falling down to earth.

Meanwhile on earth an astronomer was watching the stars falling to earth when suddenly they were attacked by a zodiac monster, this ended up causing him to fall of the cliff he was near. The Phoenix seeing this after falling to earth with its last energy tried to save the human, but ended up reincarnating around them, causing the two to absorb together creating "The Starsouled"

 

Game can be played with a Keyboard or controller
